content.rendered:
If you only have frozen lemongrass cut or whole, then it take a long time to slice lemongrass. But you can use frozen lemongrass sliced, which saves you time cooking.

The process of processing frozen lemongrass silce is same frozen lemongrass cut. Fress lemongrass will be sliced by machine, the size of lemongrass silced depending on the requirements of customers, the usual size is 2-3mm

Raw Lemongrass is selected and cut off the leaf. They are washed many times before slicing

Lemongrass are washed before slicing

Lemongrass are sliced ​​with a size of 1-2 mm

Lemongrass sliced are packed
